intro_text:
Your friend Sam just finished dental school and plans to move to North Oralington to be closer to his family. He is in his late twenties and is married with a 2 year old girl. His wife is currently not employed.

He is a general dentist with a strong interest in working with young children. When he gets to North Oralington, he would like to open or join a family-oriented private practice.

Sam has about 180K remaining in debt from dental school. His family is open to living anywhere in the state. He comes to you for your recommendation on where he should set up or join a practice.
advise_text: You just got access to a map of North Oralington. Review the map by clicking the orange button to the right, "Show Map."

questions.text: Sam would like to work with young children. Which zip code should he consider?
questions.summary: The zip code Sam should consider for working with young children

questions.text: Sam and his wife have one car. They would like to have access to public transportation. What county should he consider?
questions.summary: The county you chose with easy access to public transportation

questions.text: Sam is fluent in Spanish. Based on this fact alone, which county should he consider?
questions.summary: A county Sam should consider since he is fluent in Spanish

intro_text:
Your friend Sally graduated from dental school a couple of years earlier than you and just completed her pediatric dental residency. She is also planning to move to North Oralington.

Sally's main goal is to provide care to under-served young children and has considered working at a community health clinic. She is in her late twenties, is single, and has about 70K of remaining loans. She comes to you for advice on the best location for her to set up or join a practice.
advise_text: You just got access to a map of North Oralington. Review the map by clicking the orange button to the right, "Show Map."

questions.text: Sally has heard of a loan replacement program available if she works at a dental safety net site. What zip code should she consider?
questions.summary: The zip code Sally should consider for loan repayment at a dental safety net site

questions.text: In dental school Sally completed a rotation focused on immigrant health. In which county could she utilize this experience?
questions.summary: A county where Sally can utilize her immigrant health experience

questions.text: Sally is thinking about working as a part-time associate at a practice that serves Medicaid populations. Which county would you recommend she consider?
questions.summary: A county where Sally could begin looking for a practice serving Medicaid populations

intro_text: Imagine now that you are a newly minted dentist with a strong interest in providing dental care to young children. You also decide to move to North Oralington and you begin planning your dental career.
advise_text: After considering the available information on North Oralington, what type of dental career would you select for yourself?

questions.text: Your primary choice. This is how you intend to spend the majority of your working hours.
questions.summary: Primary choice for your dental career

questions.text: Your secondary choice. This is the next in line in terms of proportion of work hours.
questions.summary: Secondary choice for your dental career
